item.title: OPP Interviews
item.description: In this OPP series we will be interviewing scientists in Plant Pathology or related areas who has embraced open science and contributed knowledge and tools to advance the field. Our first OPP interview features Dr. Niklaus Gr√ºnwald ( @PhytophthoraLab on Twitter ), a plant pathologist with USDA ARS, Corvallis, OR, USA. Nik is well recognized by his research on population genetics and genomics of plant pathogens - mainly on oomycetes of major importance to global…
